title: Textmagic
description:
Textmagic is a business text messaging platform used by 30,000+ companies for mass texting, two-way chats, and automated notifications. It offers features like scheduled messaging, contact management, in-depth reporting, and WhatsApp integration—all with flexible pricing options that include pay-as-you-go and monthly plans.

Easily integrate SMS with your website using Textmagic’s API or connect with 1,000+ apps via Zapier. Try it for free at textmagic.com.
